channel.title: Suggestion for this forum tutorials
channel.description:
well i was thinking mabe (just a suggestion thats ALL) and i know this forum's moderators are doing a good job ;)
but this isint exactly a tutorial as well
[quote="Miss Silabsoft, post:1, topic:117587"][b] you must be using a music enabled client to use this packet here is a link to one http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,169915.0.html[/b]
Packet id: 74 payload: writeWordBigEndian( song number);
sample structure [code] public void frame74(int i) { outStream.createFrame(74); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i); } [/code]
(sorry silab no effence im just useing this as a example)
example: sense this is sound, i cant really show you an example however just try putting a frame74(15); on login then using my client.[/quote]
i mean its practicly showing what you know about it
now i think it should be more like showing how you could make it and explaining it a little as much as you can
thats what you call a tutorial not c+p and nothin els but telling how to do it (although thats how i lerned java by studying the voids ect. in them)
or this that isint showing much
and if i efended you silab i didnt mean to you have 100% right to remove this if you guys want i was just saying what i thought would help
and please dont flame me

item.title: Suggestion for this forum tutorials
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

ya u kno what u saying but

what silab posted affects all RS2 317 tutorials… cuz its the same packet every base of a server has to use.

but when you post a tutorial thats ment for 1 server base and won’t work on all server bases I guess they lock it up.

they accepting tutorials in my understanding those that are as general as it gets to RS2 server, not secondary.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion for this forum tutorials
item.dc:creator: @runescape3 runescape3
item.description:
@runescape3 wrote:

well i was thinking mabe (just a suggestion thats ALL) and i know this forum’s moderators are doing a good job

but this isint exactly a tutorial as well

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:1, topic:117587”] you must be using a music enabled client to use this packet here is a link to one http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,169915.0.html

Packet id: 74
payload: writeWordBigEndian( song number);

sample structure

public void frame74(int i)
{
outStream.createFrame(74);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i);
}

(sorry silab no effence im just useing this as a example)

example: sense this is sound, i cant really show you an example however just try putting a frame74(15); on login then using my client.[/quote]

i mean its practicly showing what you know about it

now i think it should be more like showing how you could make it and explaining it a little as much as you can

thats what you call a tutorial not c+p and nothin els but telling how to do it (although thats how i lerned java by studying the voids ect. in them)

or this that isint showing much

and if i efended you silab i didnt mean to you have 100% right to remove this if you guys want i was just saying what i thought would help

and please dont flame me

Read full topic
